name: TiCTeX LateX Bundle Compiler+IDE+PDF
summary: TiCTeX is an all in one bundle for LateX with Compiler+IDE+PDF Viewer
short_description:
LateX is one of the most widely recognised document markup language, but configuring LateX creation environment on system is a difficult task! BUT TiCTeX does it with ease!!

TiCTeX is an all in one LateX bundle comprising of a LateX Compiler ,  LateX editor IDE , inbuilt PDF Viewer and loads of Useful Utilities.!

After installing TiCTeX you don't have to do any configuration for using LateX such as adding Path variables,adding Latex compiler etc..

TiCTeX does each and everything right from LateX compiler installation,configuration,IDE configuration etc everything! that too in some Style!

SO you Just need to install TiCTeX on your PC and you can relax and create in LateX directly, its that easy and simple!
